templates.create: insert into storeproduct (storeid,productid,"type",datecreated,name,description,retailprice,wholesaleprice,modified,last_purchase,last_sale,quantity,frame_manufacturer,frame_model,frame_colour) values ('2088-PH-012', '2088-PH-012-$FRAMENUM', 'Frame', current_date,'${sq(MANUFACT)} ${sq(MODEL)}','$FRAMENUM',${numeric(RRP)},${numeric(LISTPRICE)}, '${convertDateFormat(MODIFIED,"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.S","yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.S")}'::timestamp, '${convertDateFormat(LASTPUR,"yyyy-MM-dd","yyyy-MM-dd")}'::timestamp, '${convertDateFormat(LASTSALE,"yyyy-MM-dd","yyyy-MM-dd")}'::timestamp, ${numeric(QUANTITY)}::numeric, '${sq(MANUFACT)}', '${sq(MODEL)}', '${sq(FCOLOUR)}')
templates.update: update storeproduct set name='${sq(MANUFACT)} ${sq(MODEL)}',description='$FRAMENUM',retailprice=${numeric(RRP)},wholesaleprice=${numeric(LISTPRICE)}, modified='${convertDateFormat(MODIFIED,"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.S","yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.S")}'::timestamp, last_purchase='${convertDateFormat(LASTPUR,"yyyy-MM-dd","yyyy-MM-dd")}'::timestamp, last_sale='${convertDateFormat(LASTSALE,"yyyy-MM-dd","yyyy-MM-dd")}'::timestamp,quantity=${numeric(QUANTITY)}::numeric WHERE productid='2088-PH-012-$FRAMENUM'
